title: Tracing block 1440753 on goerli throws 'RPC method debug_traceBlockByHash crashed: runtime error: index out of range [-1]'
body:

Geth version: `1.11.5`
CL client & version:  `lighthouse@v4.0.1`
OS & Version: Linux

#### Expected behaviour
